com.absio.broker.mapper

Class RestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.broker.mapper.RestClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRestClient

    public class RestClient
extends Object
implements IRestClient
    RESTful client for interacting with the Absio Broker server.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String delete(String endpoint, com.absio.broker.mapper.ICustomHeaderWork headerWork)
      Executes an HTTP DELETE to the specified endpoint.

      Executes an HTTP GET to the specified endpoint.
      byte[] getFromUrl(String url, com.absio.broker.mapper.ICustomHeaderWork headerWork)
      Executes an HTTP GET to the specified URL and returns the byte data.
      String post(String endpoint, String content, com.absio.broker.mapper.ICustomHeaderWork headerWork)
      Executes an HTTP POST to the specified endpoint with a content payload.
      String put(String endpoint, String content, com.absio.broker.mapper.ICustomHeaderWork headerWork)
      Executes an HTTP PUT to the specified endpoint with a content payload.
      String putToUrl(String url, byte[] data, com.absio.broker.mapper.ICustomHeaderWork headerWork)
      Executes an HTTP PUT to the specified URL with a data content payload.
